Exporting XML
=============

.. automodule:: cs.pcs.msp.exports

XmlExport
^^^^^^^^^

.. autoclass:: cs.pcs.msp.exports.XmlExport

   Following class members are exposed for customization purposes:

   .. autoattribute:: PROJECT_DEFAULTS
      :annotation:

   .. autoattribute:: TASK_MAPPING
      :annotation:

   .. autoattribute:: TASK_DEFAULTS
      :annotation:
